value.html: Résoudre l’équation \(y'' + |y| = 1\), avec \(y(0) = 0,\ y'(0) = 1\).

value.latex:
$$y = \begin{cases}e^x-1 &\text{ si } x < 0\cr
1-\cos x + \sin x &\text{ si } 0 \le x < \frac {3\pi}2\cr
e^{3\pi/2-x}-1    &\text{ si } x \ge \frac {3\pi}2.\cr\end{cases}$$
value.html: \[y = \begin{cases}e^x-1 &\text{ si } x < 0\cr 1-\cos x + \sin x &\text{ si } 0 \le x < \frac {3\pi}2\cr e^{3\pi/2-x}-1 &\text{ si } x \ge \frac {3\pi}2.\cr\end{cases}\]
